node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Calm Classroom ™ in Santa Monica, California. May be an image of text that says 'The world is changed by examples, not opinions. @THECALMCLASSROOM'.

node.text:
Examples over opinions. Show & tell over know & tell. Well done over well said. Drop a 💜if you agree 👇🏼✨⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

node.text:
One of my favorite mindfulness exercises! Not only is this exercise simple for our little ones, but it can also be adapted and used many times in many different settings 🙌🌈✨⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Find more exercises like this as part of “The Mindfulness Deck” (digital and physical versions available) — link in bio 💕⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Also, my entire shop (Etsy and website) is 25-50% off through Sunday (Aug. 22nd). Supplies are limited, so make sure to get there early!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Calm Classroom ™ in Santa Monica, California. May be an image of text that says 'When a child can'1 calm down, they need connection and comfort, not criticism and control. Tane Evans @THECALMCLASSROOM'.
Photo by The Calm Classroom ™ in Santa Monica, California. May be an image of text that says 'RELATIONSHIPS OVER RIGOR. @THECALMCLASSROOM'.

node.text:
ESPECIALLY during the first weeks of school. Everything else follows after you build a solid foundation of trust and respect with your little ones.  Drop a 💕 if you agree 👇🏼✨⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Calm Classroom ™ on August 16, 2021. May be an image of text that says '3 PILLARS OF respect recognition relationship rapport COMPLIMENT CHARACTER PRONOUNCE NAMES CORRECTLY POST THEIR WORK LEARN THEIR INTERESTS LISTEN TO THEIR STORIES INCENTIVES CUSTOMIZED GREETINGS ASK PERSONAL QUESTIONS SEND POSITIVE NOTES HOME SPECIAL RESPONSIBILITIES ONE-ON-ONE TIME VERBAL PRAISE OR SHOUT OUT CHAT BEFORE OR AFTER CLASS REMIND THEM THAT YOU CARE LEAD CLUB OR STUDY GROUP @THECALMCLASSROOM'.

node.text:
Want respect from your little ones? Respect THEM. Specifically, recognize them, relate to them, and build rapport. With patience and persistence in these areas, loyalty, trust, understanding, and respect will follow 💕⁣
⁣
What strategies would you add to this list? 👇🏼✨⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
#teachersofinstagram #teachersofig #iteachtoo #loveteaching #igteachers #teachertips #mindfuleducators #socialemotionallearning #socialemotionaldevelopment #counselorsofinstagram #safeschools #firstyearteacher #restorativejustice #socialemotionaldevelopment #socialemotionaleducation #socialemotionalskills #emotionalwellbeing #emotionallearning #emotionalintelligence #restorativepractices #gentleparenting #mindfulparenting #backtoschool #momsofig #momsofinstagram #lifewithlittles #homeschoolcollective #classroommanagement #rapport #earnrespect

May be an image of text that says 'Color Mindfulness Bルベ 1.Pick any color of the rainbow. 2.Set a timer for 3-5 minutes. 3.Try to think of as many items as possible that are the color use the you chose environment around you as inspiration! is up, reflect 4.When time why did you pick this color? Did any thoughts come up during the activity? THE CALM CLASSROOM'.

node.text:
My FAVORITE mindfulness exercise to use in the classroom! Not only is it simple for our little ones, but it can also be adapted and used many times in many different settings 🙌🌈✨⁣
⁣
Find more exercises like this as part of “The Mindfulness Deck” (digital and physical versions available) — link in bio 💕⁣
⁣
Also, my entire shop (Etsy and website) is 25-50% off today through next Sunday (Aug. 22nd). Supplies are limited, so make sure to get there early!⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣

node.text:
MY BIGGEST SALE YET!! 🚨✨⁣⁣
⁣⁣
My entire shop is 25-50% off from Sunday, August 15th to Sunday, August 22nd in celebration of Back-to-School season! Supplies are very limited for certain products, so make sure to get there early!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Also, I have some new and updated products coming in September, so some of these items will not be returning (specifically, our 2.5 x 3.5 in. physical card decks and digital journals). Make sure to get your copies before supplies run out FOREVER!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Link to Etsy and website in bio ☺️💕✨⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣

node.text:
Love this quote and strategy so much. If only I could have my own emotionally intelligent DJ follow me around as well 💃🏻⁣

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Calm Classroom ™ in Santa Monica, California. May be an image of text that says 'Can we please stop rewarding children for PERFECT ATTENDANCE? @THECALMCLASSROOM'.

node.text:
Going to school when you're sick or need a mental health break shouldn't be glorified or incentivized. These types of awards reinforce hustle culture, cause burnout, & can actually be demotivating if students become ineligible. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
What behaviors/actions do you think should be recognized instead? 👇🏼✨⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

node.text:
This digital card deck bundle is a $45 value for only $24.99 (that's two decks for FREE!), and includes downloadable, resizeable PDF files for The Mindfulness Deck, The Breathing Deck, The Emotions Deck, The Conversation Deck, AND the Affirmation Alphabet!⁣
⁣
These card decks were designed with children and adults in mind, and are perfect for calm down corners, restorative justice activities, talking circles, morning meetings, and mindful moments. They also makes the perfect gift for educators, mental health professionals, parents, children, or anyone with an interest in self-care and social-emotional learning.⁣
⁣
Available on our Etsy & website — links in bio 💕✨⁣
⁣
